arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
	-- Grant the item to the player who operated the chest, player makes a comment
	Hydra.ItemGiveQuestItemToPlayer(idActorPlayer, itemEliasFinger, "QST_Hawe_Delta_03")
	idFingerPlayer = idActorPlayer
	Hydra.Wait(0.5)

	------------------------------------------------
	-- MarkerLink Variable Setup
	-- We need to do this here since we can't use PSV to grab dungeon content.
	-- These are all linked to the Chest in the labeled markerset.
	------------------------------------------------
	
	-- This is the delay from the moment the water begins rising that the traversal is disabled + the triggers are used to stun players.
	-- They are additive, which means the total event time is 10 seconds.
	tTriggerKillDelays = {7.5,0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5}

	-- These are Proximity Triggers. When the Trigger Kill Delay is met, every actor inside is stunned
	tIslandTriggers = {
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "ISLAND_00")[1],
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "ISLAND_01")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "ISLAND_02")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "ISLAND_03")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "ISLAND_04")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "ISLAND_05")[1]
				}
				
				
	-- These are used to disable/enable traversals.
	-- They are snapped to the position of the traversals starting with the one you use to leave the island
	tTraversalProbes = {
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "TRAVERSAL_PROBE_00")[1],
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "TRAVERSAL_PROBE_01")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "TRAVERSAL_PROBE_02")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "TRAVERSAL_PROBE_03")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "TRAVERSAL_PROBE_04")[1], 
				Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "TRAVERSAL_PROBE_05")[1]
				}
				
	idBlockingRocks = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "BLOCKING_ROCKS")[1]
	idFallingDebrisLocation = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "FALLING_DEBRIS_LOC")[1]
				
	--These are used to disable/enable traps,
	--They will turn on after you've picked up the finger
	tTraps = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "TRAPS")

	
	

	
	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(conv_FloodedPassage, idActor)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(conv_FloodedPassage)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idWeakPillar, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idWeakPillar, true)

end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)

	Hydra.Wait(7)
	for i, TraversalKill in ipairs(tTraversalKillers) do
		SetTraversalEnabled(TraversalKill, true)
	end
	
	--updating minimap to reaveal bridge
	Hydra.ActorSceneRevealSecretMap(tTraversalKillers[1], 1)

end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	idPlayer = idActorPlayer
	Hydra.ActorKill(idActorNPC)
	
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	idPlayer = idActorPlayer
	Hydra.ActorKill(idActorNPC)

end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	idPlayer = idActorPlayer
	Hydra.ActorKill(idActorNPC)
	
end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
Hydra.Wait(1)

if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) then
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(conv_PlayerMuses, idPlayer)
end 

Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorPlayer, sWorldName)

	if not Hydra.IsPlayerVariableSet(idActorPlayer, "DeltaFirstTimeInTemple") then
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idActorPlayer, POWER_WAKEUP)
		Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idActorPlayer, "DeltaFirstTimeInTemple")
	end
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	Hydra.ActorKill(idActorNPC)
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(conv_FirstRitual, idActorPlayer)

end

arQuestPhases.szOnEnterScript:
idWeakPillar = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Hawe_Delta_WeakPillar")[1]
Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idWeakPillar, true)
Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idWeakPillar, false)

tTraversalKillers = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Hawe_Delta_WeakPillarTraversalKillers")

for i, TraversalKill in ipairs(tTraversalKillers) do
	SetTraversalEnabled(TraversalKill, false)
end

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorPlayer, sWorldName)

	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorPlayer, S_FADE_IN_EFF)

	if not Hydra.IsPlayerVariableSet(idActorPlayer, "DeltaFirstTimeInTemple") then
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idActorPlayer, POWER_WAKEUP)
		Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idActorPlayer, "DeltaFirstTimeInTemple")
	end

	

end

function Start()
	
	-- Create the heartbeat actor (deleted at the end)
	-- spawn on a point, since players can become invalid at any time
	idHeartBeat = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(sHeartBeatSounds, idFallingDebrisLocation) 
	
	Hydra.Wait(0.5)
	
	-- Rocks fall near the player
	-- This also starts the actual water rising (embedded in this actor)
	Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(idFallingDebris,idFallingDebrisLocation,false,0,0)
	
	-- Refresh the player table
	tPlayers = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()
	
	for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tPlayers) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) then
			if Hydra.ActorGetLevelArea(idPlayer) == "CSD_Hawe_Swamp_TempleoftheDeathspeaker_RunLikeHeck" then -- Only players within the flooding section
				Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idPlayer, fxScreenShake)
			end
		end
	end

	
	for i, idTrap in ipairs(tTraps) do
		Hydra.ActorEnable(idTrap)
	end
	
	Hydra.Wait(2.0) -- 2.5 total wait

	-- "Im not going to die in here!"
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idFingerPlayer) then
		Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(conv_Escape, idFingerPlayer)
	end
	
	-----------------------------------------
	-- VIGNETTE -Phase 2 Logic Start Immedietley
	-----------------------------------------

	
	-- The Hydra.Waits() in here add up to 10 seconds (declared in previous phase)
	SetTraversalEnabled(tTraversalProbes[6], false)
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idBlockingRocks,false)
	
	for i=1, #tTriggerKillDelays, 1 do
		Hydra.Wait (tTriggerKillDelays[i])
		tActorsInTrigger = Hydra.ActorsInTriggerBounds(tIslandTriggers[i])

		for i, idActorInTrigger in ipairs(tActorsInTrigger) do
			-- only stun players, ignore other actor SNOs
			if Hydra.ActorIsPlayer(idActorInTrigger) then 
				Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtTarget(idActorInTrigger, idActorInTrigger, powerStun)
			end
		end
		
		SetTraversalEnabled(tTraversalProbes[i], false)
	end
	
	-- By the time we get here, we have Hydra.Wait()ed 12.5 seconds total.
	
	-- Remove the heartbeat that was created earlier
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idHeartBeat) then
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idHeartBeat)
	end	


	-- Refresh the player table
	tPlayers = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()
	
	-- Make the screen dark
	for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tPlayers) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) then
			if Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idPlayer) == "CSD_Hawe_Swamp_TempleoftheDeathspeaker" then -- Only players within this world
				Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idPlayer, fxFadeToBlack)
				
				-- Stun everyone in case we somehow missed someone
				Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtTarget(idPlayer, idPlayer, powerStun)
			end
		end
	end
	
	
	-- objective complete at this point on the tracker
	Hydra.EventSend("Deathspeaker_FloodingComplete")
	
	-- Wait a beat
	Hydra.Wait(4) -- The 17.5 seconds total
	
	
	-- Refresh the player table
	tPlayers = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()
	
	--Warp to sanctuary
	for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tPlayers) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) then
			if Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idPlayer) == "CSD_Hawe_Swamp_TempleoftheDeathspeaker" then -- Only players within this world
				
				-- We are setting the game variable HERE because if there are no players inside this dungeon when we get here, 
				-- it means they used a scroll of escape, and they will not be appearing where you would if the delta quest continued. 
				-- We treat this as a relog.
				Hydra.SetGameVariableFlag("DeltaQuestContinued", true)
				
				-- Remove the stun buff before you warp.
				Hydra.BuffRemove(powerStun, "STUN_SELF", idPlayer) 
				
				-- Warp to where lorath is standing, concatenate the GBID with the player index, so the players dont stack on eachother
				Hydra.PlayerWarpToWorld(idPlayer, "Sanctuary_Eastern_Continent", "CSD_Hawe_Swamp_TempleoftheDeathspeaker_Exit_Alt_"..i, true, true)
			end
		end
	end
end
